title: China's Wind Farms Are Doing A Lot More Than Generating Electricity
full_text: China's Wind Farms Are Doing A Lot More Than Generating Electricity. China's growth with solar and wind energy has outpaced every other major nation around the world combined in an effort to combat climate change.. Nations around the world are dedicating a tremendous amount of resources to projects that can help reduce or restore some of the damage caused by climate change. One significant change that's taking … [+5099 chars]
